attributes.additional_details: Why should people that have abused other people's human rights have a right to be protected by Human Right's Laws themselves.  Lets bring a common sense approach and decide on our own policys for dealing with scum that are out to spoil the life of the hard working british public. Why should we the british public let Europe and some of their stupid rules decide on what is appropriate to people that have robbed, raped and murdered as well as many other horrible crimes that can ruin peoples lives forever.
